message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe its value extends far beyond its tangible features, making it an exceptional investment for you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am proposing a price of $15000 for this exclusive item. I trust this aligns well with its worth to you. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a lower price of $10000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget considerations, and I appreciate your interest in our product. In light of that, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product. This still reflects its high value and quality, while being more accessible to you. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.
